mods.note: \[illegible]Haywood Co., No. Ca.July 10, 1925\nMy dear Judge Hicks,I sent you \Science, Falsely So-Called-\ the other day. I see I said [Where?] Enemies in first verse I meant And enemies.Also in second to last verse, you wil[l]2be doing me a favour if you will change a mistake in this also in both copies. In the Agassiz verse Please change words \all history\ to race history.Thank you very much for [correcting?] & giving copy to the greatest orator - Bryan.Yours truly, Jeannette R. Murphy.
